mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PERMISSION (PERMISSION_ID, "NAME", URL, NOTE, CODE) VALUES (#{permissionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: SELECT PERMISSION_ID, "NAME", URL, NOTE, CODE FROM T_PERMISSION WHERE PERMISSION_ID = #{permissionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
SELECT PERMISSION_ID, "NAME", URL, NOTE, CODE FROM T_PERMISSION

SELECT T_PERMISSION.PERMISSION_ID, T_PERMISSION."NAME", URL, T_PERMISSION.NOTE, CODE FROM T_PERMISSION JOIN T_ROLE_PERMISSION ON T_PERMISSION.PERMISSION_ID = T_ROLE_PERMISSION.PERMISSION_ID JOIN T_ROLE ON T_ROLE.ROLE_ID = T_ROLE_PERMISSION.ROLE_ID JOIN T_USER_ROLE ON T_USER_ROLE.USER_ID = T_USER.USER_ID WHERE T_USER.USERNAME = #{username}
